sourcesContent:
import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import "./singlePost.css" import { useEffect } from "react" import axios from "axios" export default function SinglePost() { const location =useLocation() const path=location.pathname.split("/")[2] const [post,setPost]=useState({}) console.log(path); useEffect(()=>{ const getPost=async()=>{ const res=await axios.get("/post/"+path) setPost(res.data) }; getPost(); },[path]) return (
